response.original_title: Pure Earth: Vol. 1: Discover the Sights and Sounds of Our Planet
response.overview: Enjoy a unique sensory experience with this striking compilation of sounds and images from around the globe. Set against a stunning montage of photos from America, Australia, New Zealand, India and the Antarctic, atmospheric music creates a calming mood, weaving through the natural and the mystical world. Indian, Arabic and Mongolian songs deliver an unusual blend of orchestral music, electronica, hypnotic rhythms and ethnic sound effects.
response.title: Pure Earth: Vol. 1: Discover the Sights and Sounds of Our Planet
